title: Client-Centered Instructional Design Practicum: Mathematics Educational Materials Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theories and understanding of secondary mathematics curriculum
context.additional_context: Learners collaborate with public institutions to develop digital math educational content and submit project outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can establish instructional design objectives by analyzing client requirements
Learners can develop a digital content prototype for mathematics education by applying the ADDIE model
Learners can improve final deliverables by incorporating peer and client feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
